Investor_15_pre_2.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15_pre_2.content: Throughout the investment process, I have maintained transparency and fairness, actively engaging in clear dialogue to ensure equitable profit distribution while protecting my interests. My commitment to a collaborative approach has bolstered trust between myself and the trustee. As a result, my reputation is strong, characterized by reliability, trustworthiness, and pro-social tendencies.

Investor_15_pre_3.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15_pre_3.content: Throughout the investment process, I have maintained reliability and transparency, fostering a positive and equitable relationship with my trustee. My proactive engagement in discussions and commitment to fair profit-sharing reflects my dedication to a collaborative environment. My reputation as a trustworthy and competent investor remains strong, marked by a consistent focus on mutual respect and interest protection.

Investor_15_pre_4.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15_pre_4.content: I have consistently showcased reliability and transparency throughout the investment process, emphasizing proactive communication and a commitment to fair profit-sharing. My behavior has reinforced my reputation as a trustworthy and responsible investor, fostering equitable relationships in the investment community. This transaction has further solidified my standing, marking me as a partner dedicated to mutual respect and integrity.

Trustee_15_pre_7.name: Ahmed Hassan
Trustee_15_pre_7.content: During the investment process, I upheld the proposed allocation plan, ensuring fairness in profit distribution, where the investor received more than half of the profits. My commitment to integrity and transparency was evident throughout the transaction. As a result, my reputation has improved, reflecting trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence. I have been successful in establishing positive relationships with investors, and I aim to maintain this standard moving forward as I strengthen my connections in the investment community.
